name: One-Pot Chili Mac and Cheese
author: RAGÚ®
summary: This delicious chili mac and cheese with ground beef, diced tomatoes, rich tomato sauce, chili beans and spices is cooked all in one pot--including the macaroni!
ingredients: 2 cups Ragu® Old World Style® Traditional Pasta Sauce
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 (16 ounce) can mild chili beans, undrained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven or pot over medium-high heat
Stirring frequently, cook until meat is browned and crumbly, about 3 minutes
Stir in chicken broth, Ragu® sauce, diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, beans, chili powder, and cumin
Season with salt and pepper, to taste
Bring to a boil and stir in pasta; cover, reduce heat to a simmer and cook until pasta is al dente, about 14 minutes
Stir in the cheese and parsley
Serve immediately, garnished with additional cheese and parsley, if desired
